description: Retrieves information about the specified Glue usage profile.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the usage profile to retrieve.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the usage profile.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the usage profile.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: A ProfileConfiguration object specifying the job and session values for the profile.

nested_items.name: SessionConfiguration
nested_items.description: A key-value map of configuration parameters for Glue sessions.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: A default value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: A list of allowed values for the parameter.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: A minimum allowed value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: A maximum allowed value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: JobConfiguration
nested_items.description: A key-value map of configuration parameters for Glue jobs.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: A default value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: A list of allowed values for the parameter.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: A minimum allowed value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: A maximum allowed value for the parameter.

nested_items.name: CreatedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the usage profile was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the usage profile was last modified.
